text: to vah (sulaimaan) muskuraakar hans pada usakee baat par aur kahaah he mere paalanahaar! mujhe kshamata pradaanakar ki main krtagy rahoon tere us puraskaar ka, jo puraskaar toone mujhapar tatha mere maata-pita par kiya hai tatha ye ki main sadaachaar karata rahoon, jisase too prasann rahe aur mujhe pravesh de apanee daya se, apane sadaachaaree bhakton mein
